about_me: Hello! I am a Chemical System Technical Specialist, passionate about bridging Material Science, Technical Cleanliness, Rust Prevention, and Process Engineering to deliver high-performance and sustainable industrial solutions. My expertise lies in optimizing chemical processes and ensuring material integrity in complex environments. I thrive on translating intricate scientific principles into practical, impactful solutions.

casestudies.title: Optimizing Cleaning Process for Sensitive Automotive Components
casestudies.description: Reduced solvent usage by 40% and improved cleanliness standards (particle count reduction by 95%) for critical engine parts, leading to zero field failures related to contamination.

casestudies.title: Developing a Sustainable Rust Prevention Strategy
casestudies.description: Implemented a VCI (Volatile Corrosion Inhibitor) packaging system that extended the shelf life of highly reactive metal components from 6 months to 2 years, cutting down warranty claims significantly.

casestudies.title: Process Engineering for High-Purity Chemical Delivery
casestudies.description: Redesigned the chemical delivery line for a semiconductor manufacturing facility, achieving POU (Point-of-Use) chemical purity levels exceeding industry standards and boosting production yield by 8%.

projects.name: IoT Sensor Integration for Process Monitoring

articles.title: The Future of VCI Technology in Global Supply Chains
Best Practices for Maintaining Technical Cleanliness in EV Manufacturing
